content: half of the legend of the holly king and the oak king i wish you abundance pattern is a 7 stitch repeat 6 advent socks poinsettia/winter rose in the language of flowers the poinsettia/winter rose symbolize good cheer and success and are said to bring wishes of mirth and celebration i wish you mirth pattern is a 10 stitch repeat buffalo plaid i can think of very few things that are as comforting as warm flannels by a cozy fire i wish you comfort pattern is a 10 stitch repeat evergreen sprig like the holly on day 1 the evergreen sprig is a sign that spring will return fresh cut greens is one of my absolute favourite things in december i wish you health note this is one of the few colourwork sections that is not a simple repeat please pay careful attention in the first row crystal candy dish december is definitely one time of the year that sweets are in abundance i remember visiting far-away family during the holidays where there was always a crystal dish filled with bright swirly candies to be sampled i wish you indulgence pattern is a 7 stitch repeat 7 advent socks starlight one of our traditions every december is to go for night-time walks as often as possible once the weather becomes crisp with darkness coming earlier as the month wears on star-gazing opportunities abound i wish you light in the darkness pattern is a 7 stitch repeat ribbons/baubles colouring chart on brown paper packages on wreaths on tabletops and trees richly patterned ribbons and baubles are a wonderful celebration of craftsmanship i wish you creativity pattern is a 14 stitch repeat peppermint sticks an iconic candy invoking childhood simple joys and seasonal celebrations i wish you simplicity pattern is a 5 stitch repeat snowdrift colouring chart i remember bundling up in all the layers imaginable to play for hours in the snow digging out forts making snow angels building snow men tracing out messages and images with our footprints i remember my children doing all the same activities i wish you pure unadulterated joy note this is one of the few colourwork sections that is not a simple repeat please pay careful attention in the first row j 8
